intro:
A classic escape game set in the Edo period!
Solve the mysteries and aim to escape from the Edo period.
description:
■Game System
This is an escape game (puzzle adventure game).
*The game progresses by selecting items on the screen with the cursor and solving various puzzles.

■Story
On the way home from shopping,

I was caught in a sudden rain shower

and took shelter under a nearby tree.

Then―

I was struck by lightning and woke up to find

that something strange was happening around me.
